name: FactorizAtIon (itch)
description:
Hello and welcome to Factorization,  dont worry this isn't to do with math.

Le Controls:

Q = Cycle between blocks

Click = Place Block

Blocks = Turret(pew,pew),Miner(Brrrrr),ByteMaker (bit make byte), Core(this is the important one as you lose if it die and it make logic out of bytes)

Protecc core with turrets. and make a logic factory to make better gun
